faq-authentic-windows-question.message: Da li je moj Psiphon za Windows autentičan?

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon za Windows se nikad ne distribuira kao instalacijski paket. Svaki Psiphon za Windows klijent je jedna izvršna datoteka (".exe") koju je digitalno potpisao Psiphon Inc. Windows automatski provjerava potpis pri pokretanju klijenta. Također možete ručno provjeriti potpis prije pokretanja klijenta kroz dijalog Svojstva datoteke, te zatim kartice Digitalni potpisi. SHA1 otisak prsta za certifikat javnog ključa Psiphon Inc.-a je prikazan u dijalogu Certifikati kartice Detalji.

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2020.message: For the certificate valid for the period 2017-07-05 to 2020-10-03 the SHA1 thumbprint is:
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2020.description: The Psiphon for Windows client can be authenticated by checking the certificate used to sign it has the correct thumbprint. The certificate is valid for a certain date range, and the thumbprint is shown below this sentence. 'SHA1' is the name of a hash algorithm, used to calculate the thumbprint (and is probably not translated).

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2017.message: Za certifikat koji vrijedi u periodu od 2014-05-08 do 2017-09-06 SHA1 otisak prsta je:
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2017.description: The Psiphon for Windows client can be authenticated by checking the certificate used to sign it has the correct thumbprint. The certificate is valid for a certain date range, and the thumbprint is shown below this sentence. 'SHA1' is the name of a hash algorithm, used to calculate the thumbprint (and is probably not translated).

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-3.message: Za certifikat koji je valjan u periodu od 2012-05-21 do 2014-07-30 SHA1  otisak prsta je:
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-3.description: The Psiphon for Windows client can be authenticated by checking the certificate used to sign it has the correct thumbprint. The certificate is valid for a certain date range, and the thumbprint is shown below this sentence. 'SHA1' is the name of a hash algorithm, used to calculate the thumbprint (and is probably not translated).

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2.message: Za certifikat koji je valjan u periodu od 2011-06-16 do 2012-06-21 SHA1 otisak prsta je:
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2.description: The Psiphon for Windows client can be authenticated by checking the certificate used to sign it has the correct thumbprint. The certificate is valid for a certain date range, and the thumbprint is shown below this sentence. 'SHA1' is the name of a hash algorithm, used to calculate the thumbprint (and is probably not translated).

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-4.message: Psiphon za Windows se automatski ažurira, te ovaj proces automatski verificira autentičnost svakog ažuriranja.

faq-authentic-android-question.message: Da li je moj Psiphon za Android autentičan?

faq-authentic-android-answer-alert.message: UPOZORENJE: Nedavno prijavljena ranjivost prilikom provjeravanja potpisa Android aplikacije može rezultirati pogrešnim prijavljivanjem malicioznih APK-ova kao ispravnih. Preporučamo da korisnici uključe opciju Google Provjera Aplikacija kao što je dokumentirano ovdje.

faq-authentic-android-answer-para-1.message: Svaki Psiphon klijent za Android se šalje kao Android APK datoteka (".apk") digitalno potpisana od strane Psiphon Inc. Javni ključ Psiphon Inc. certifikata je:

faq-authentic-android-answer-para-2.message: APK može biti provjeren tako što (1) raspakirate certifikat iz arhive i provjerite da se otisci prstiju slažu ili (2) provjerite da je APK potpisan s certifikatom. Na primjer, koristeći Unix i Java alate iz naredbenog retka:

faq-authentic-android-answer-para-3.message: Psiphon za Android se automatski ažurira i taj proces automatski provjerava autentičnost svakog ažuriranja.

faq-unsupported-platforms-question.message: Is Psiphon available for macOS, Linux, Windows Phone, etc.?

faq-unsupported-platforms-answer-para-1.message: Podržane platforme su one dostupne na stranici za preuzimanje. Konstantno radimo na proširenju podrške platformi, nadamo se da ćemo uskoro raditi i na Vašem željenom OS-u!
faq-unsupported-platforms-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Is Psiphon available for OS X, Linux, iOS, Windows Phone, etc.?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.message: “Sideloading” means installing an app on your device without going through the Play Store. This is desirable for people who do not have access to the Play Store, or when the app is not available in their region.
faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.description: Part of the answer to the FAQ question 'How do I enable Android “Sideloading”?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.message: In order to install a direct download of Psiphon for Android, you must enable sideloading on your device. To do so, go into your Android settings, then into the “Security” section, then enable “Unknown sources”.
faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.description: Part of the answer to the FAQ question 'How do I enable Android “Sideloading”?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-image-alt.message: Screenshot of the Android security setting that allows installation of non-Play Store apps

faq-windows-xp-eol-question.message: Does Psiphon for Windows work on Windows XP or Vista?

faq-windows-xp-eol-answer-para-1.message: As of December 2019, Psiphon does not support Windows XP or Vista. A legacy build is available for download that will work on those platforms for the foreseeable future, but users are strongly encouraged to upgrade to a recent version of Windows.
faq-windows-xp-eol-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Does Psiphon for Windows work on Windows XP or Vista?'

faq-information-collected-answer-redirec.message: Pogledajte našu Izjavu o privatnosti kako bi naučili o informacijama koje skupljamo.
faq-information-collected-answer-redirec.description: This is the FAQ answer to the question 'What info does Psiphon collect?' The user needs to go to a separate page to see the full answer.

faq-ip-change-question.message: Zašto se moja Psiphon IP adresa često mijenja?

faq-ip-change-answer-para-1.message: Vaš Psiphon klijent će automatski otkriti nove Psiphon poslužitelje. Kad je posljednji poslužitelj koji ste koristili nedostupan, možete koristiti neki drugi.

faq-connection-failed-question.message: Zašto stalno iznova vidim poruku "spajanje neuspjelo"?

faq-connection-failed-answer-para-1.message: Ako Vam stalno pojavljuju "spajanje neuspjelo" poruke, znači da nema dostupnih poslužitelja za koje Vaš klijent zna. Probajte preuzeti novi Psiphon klijent.

faq-reset-system-proxy-question.message: Nakon korištenja Psiphon-a za Windows, moje računalo se više ne može spojiti na Internet.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-1.message: Kad se Psiphon za Windows spoji, promjeni postavke proxy-a Vašeg računala, a kad se odjavi vrati ih natrag na prvotne postavke. Ako Psiphon za Windows ne izađe kako treba, možda neće ispravno vratiti stare postavke Vašeg proxy-a, što će rezultirati nemogućnošću spajanja na Internet.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.'

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-2.message: Većini ljudi, najlakši način za popravak ovog problema je ponovno pokretanje Psiphona, a zatim odspajanje.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.'

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-3.message: Kako bi ručno promjenili postavke proxy-a, otvorite Internet Explorer, te navigirajte u izbornik Alati (ili ikonu zupčanika), Internet opcije → Veze → Postavke LAN-a. Uklonite kvačicu kraj "Koristi proxy poslužitelj za LAN"
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.'

faq-android-upgrade-bug-question.message: Nakon nadogradnje aplikacije Psiphon za Android, ista se ne spaja.

faq-android-upgrade-bug-answer-para-1.message: Ako je Psiphon spojen dok se nadogradnja instalira, možda se neće moći spojiti te će javljati grešku "start_tunnel_failed application is not prepared or revoked”. Do ovog dolazi zbog Android OS greške. Ovakvo stanje može biti popravljeno ponovnim pokretanjem Vašeg uređaja.
faq-android-upgrade-bug-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After upgrading the Psiphon for Android app, it won't connect.'

faq-periodic-disconnect-question.message: Zašto se moja Psiphon veza ponekad odspoji?

faq-periodic-disconnect-answer-para-1.message: To se najčešće događa zbog nestalne Internet veze s Vašim uređajem ili računalom. Na telefonu, ovo može značiti gubitak signala. Na računalu, ovo može značiti nestalnu Wi-Fi vezu ili nepouzdanog davatelja Internet usluge.
faq-periodic-disconnect-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my Psiphon connection sometimes disconnect?'

faq-ie6-docbody-question.message: Psiphon za Windows javlja grešku “doc.body is null or not an object” i ne radi.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-1.message: Do ove greške dolazi na Windows XP ako je Internet Explorer 6 instaliran. Psiphon za Windows zahtjeva instaliran Internet Explorer 7 ili noviji. Najbolji način je da instalirate noviju verziju Internet Explorer-a putem Windows Update-a.
faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.'

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-2.message: Ako ne možete koristiti Windows ažuriranje i želite instalirati Internet Explorer 7 ili 8 direktno, možete ih preuzeti putem oih poveznica:
faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.'

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-xpie8.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' This text is used as a link to a download.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-xpie7.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' This text is used as a link to a download.

faq-check-version-question.message: Kako ću provjeriti trenutnu verziju Psiphon-a?

faq-check-version-answer-para-1.message: Kad se Psiphon pokrene, prikazuje verziju klijenta na prvoj linij izlaza zapisa.

faq-get-updated-version-question.message: Kako da preuzmem ažuriranu verziju Psiphon-a?

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-1.message: Android: Ako ste instalirali Psiphon za Android preko Google Play Trgovine, bit će automatski ažuriran kad nova ažuriranja postanu dostupna. Ako ste neovisno instalirali Psiphon za Android, Psiphon klijent će preuzeti ažuriranja kad su dostupna, te će Vas pitati želite li instalirati novu verziju.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' for Android users.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-2.message: Windows: Klijent Psiphon-a za Windows će preuzeti i instalirat ažuriranja čim postanu dostupna.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' for Windows users.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-3.message: Ručno ažuriranje: Ako Psiphon-ov automatski mehanizam ažuriranja ne radi (primjerice, ako je blokiran), možete naći sve informacije o preuzimanju nove kopije Psiphon-a sa stranice za preuzimanje.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' if the user believes that the automatic updating feature isn't working (or is blocked).

faq-orig-file-purpose-answer-para-1.message: Automatski proces ažuriranja u Psiphon-u za Windowse preimenuje svoju staru verziju u "psiphon3.exe.orig". Stare datoteke sa sufiksom ".orig" mogu biti obrisane.

faq-uninstall-windows-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon za Windows se ne instalira, i neće se pojaviti u popisu instaliranih programa u Windows-ima. Izvršnu datoteku možete pokrenuti iz direktorija "Preuzimanja", ili može biti kopirana u drugi direktorij, te pokrenuta odatle. Ako želite ukloniti program, možete jednostavno obrisati izvršnu datoteku.
faq-uninstall-windows-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I uninstall Psiphon for Windows?'

faq-clear-windows-data-question.message: How do I clear Psiphon for Windows' local data?

faq-clear-windows-data-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon for Windows stores some data locally under the user's profile. It is located at a path like C:\Users\YourName\AppData\Roaming\Psiphon3; or, more generally, %APPDATA%\Psiphon3. You can delete the local data by going to that path in Windows Explorer and deleting it, or entering this command at a command prompt: rmdir /s "%APPDATA%\Psiphon3".
faq-clear-windows-data-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I clear Psiphon for Windows' local data?'

faq-proxy-all-question.message: Provodi li Psiphon za Windows sav moj Internet promet kroz proxy?

faq-proxy-all-answer-para-1.message: Samo u VPN načinu rada. Nakon što je uspostavjena uspješna veza u VPN načinu rada, cijelokupan promet Vašeg računala će prolaziti kroz Psiphon mrežu. Kad VPN način rada nije omogućen, samo aplikacije koje koriste lokalne HTTP i SOCKS proxy-e će biti proxy-ane.

faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-question.message: Does Psiphon Browser for iOS proxy all of my device's Internet traffic?

faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon Browser for iOS is a browser-only application and so will only tunnel data that is loaded in the app itself, and will not tunnel your other apps (like your Facebook or Twitter apps) through the Psiphon network. So, for example, if you wanted to use the Psiphon network to access your Facebook account, you would use Psiphon Browser to go the Facebook website. If you were to open your Facebook app, it would use your direct internet connection, and would not be tunneled through the Psiphon network.

faq-browser-compatibility-question.message: Da li je Psiphon za Windows kompatibilan s Internet Explorer, Firefox i Chrome preglednicima?

faq-browser-compatibility-answer-para-1.message: Da. Provjerite postavke svog preglednika i osigurajte da je konfiguriran da koristi postavke proxy-a sustava.

faq-port-restrictions-question.message: Postoje li restrikcije portova kod korištenja Psiphon-a?
faq-port-restrictions-question.description: FAQ question. Note that 'port' is referring to network ports.

faq-port-restrictions-answer-para-1.message: Outbound connections via the Psiphon network can only be made to a restricted set of server ports including: 53, 80, 443, 465, 587, 993, 995, 8000, 8001, 8080. See this discussion for more information. Mail clients cannot establish outbound connections on port 25. See this discussion for more information.
faq-port-restrictions-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Are there any port restrictions when using Psiphon?'

faq-mail-apps-ports-question.message: Zašto ne mogu koristit svoju omiljenu aplikaciju dok je Psiphon pokrenut? Zašto ne mogu poslati email koristeći svoj mail klijent?

faq-mail-apps-ports-answer-para-1.message: Ovo je vjerovatno zbog Psiphon-ovih ograničenja portova.
faq-mail-apps-ports-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I use my favorite app while Psiphon is running? Why can't I send email using my mail client?'

faq-mobile-hotspot-question.message: Zašto Adnroid mobilni hotspot i USB povezivanje ne rade kroz Psiphon?

faq-mobile-hotspot-answer-para-1.message: Do ovoga dolazi zbog ograničenja u Androidovoj implementaciji hotspota i povezivanja. Može se dogoditi da povezani uređaj nema spoj na Internet ili da se promet ne usmjerava kroz VPN.
faq-mobile-hotspot-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why do Android mobile hotspot and USB tethering not work through Psiphon?'

faq-av-firewall-question.message: Zašto moj antivirus (AV) ili vatrozid identificiraju Psiphon kao prijetnju?

faq-av-firewall-answer-para-1.message: Prvo provjerite imate li autentičnu kopiju Psiphon-a. Pratite ove instrukcije kako bi verificirali svoju kopiju Psiphon-a. Ako nije autentična, molimo Vas poštaljite nam email s informacijama o tome kako ste nabavili kopiju i, ako je moguće, pošaljite i izvršnu datoteku.
faq-av-firewall-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my antivirus or firewall identify Psiphon as a threat?'

faq-av-firewall-answer-para-2.message: Ako je Psiphon autentičan, onda se radi o lažnom pozitivu. Iako većina antivirusa i vatrozda imaju dodan Psiphon-ov digitalni potpis u svoje popise dopuštenih aplikacija, neki od njih još uvjek greškom identificiraju Psiphon kao prijetnju. U tom slučaju, molimo Vas da nam pošaljete email, navodeći koji AV/vatrozid program koristite, a mi ćemo kontaktirati proizvođača AV-a/vatrozida kako bi rješili problem.
faq-av-firewall-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my antivirus or firewall identify Psiphon as a threat?'

faq-windows-metro-question.message: Zašto ne mogu tunelirati Windows Metro (Moderni UI) aplikacije kroz Psiphon?
faq-windows-metro-question.description: FAQ question. 'Metro' or 'Modern' is the fancy user interface that Microsoft introduced with Windows 8.

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-1.message: Windows 8 je uveo alternativu klasičnom desktop sučelju nazvanu "Metro", koja je kasnije preimenovana u "Modern UI". Neke aplikacije mogu biti pokrenute samo u "Metro" načinu rada, a neke (kao Internet Explorer) mogu biti pokrenute u "Metro" ili "Desktop" načinu rada. Novo korisničko sučelje postoji u Windows 8, Windows 8.1 i u manjem stupnju u Windows 10.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?'

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-2.message: Aplikacije u Metro načinu rada mogu koristiti lokalni proxy bez da korisnik mjenja sigurnosne postavke sustava. To znači da Metro aplikacije ne mogu koristiti Psiphon, i neće moći pristupiti Internetu dok je Psiphon spojen. Možete koristiti EnableLoopback Utility kako bi dozvolili aplikacijama da rade sa Psiphon-om u Metro načinu rada.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?' 'EnableLoopback' should not be translated.

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-3.message: Sljedeći primjeri si neke od grešaka koje bi mogli vidjeti kad aplikacije koje rade u Metro načinu rada pokušavaju i ne uspjevaju raditi kroz Psiphon.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?' This sentence is followed by two screenshots of error messages.

faq-vpn-protocol-question.message: Koji VPN protokol koristi Psiphon za Winodws? Zašto se ne mogu spojiti?

faq-windows-vpn-connect-question.message: Zašto se ne mogu spojiti s Psiphonom za Windowse u L2TP/IPsec načinu rada?

faq-windows-vpn-connect-answer-para-1.message: Vatrozid Vaše mreže možda ne dopušta korištenje VPN-a. Vaš kućni ruter možda nije postavljen da prolazi kroz taj VPN protokol; provjerite postavke svog vatrozida da bi utvrdili da je IPsec ili L2TP propusnost omogućena. IPsec servisi Vašeg sustava mogu biti onemogućeni; provjerite postavke svojih servisa i omogućite im automatsko pokretanje.

faq-vpn-slow-question.message: Mogu se spojiti sa Psiphon-om za Windows u VPN načinu rada, ali zašto je tako sporo? Ponekad se web stranice uopće ne učitaju.

faq-vpn-slow-answer-para-1.message: Određeni mrežni hardware ili Internet veze mogu prouzročiti probleme za L2TP/IPsec, protokol korišten za VPN način rada Psiphon-a. Probajte onemogućiti VPN način rada.

faq-vpn-dns-question.message: Kad se spojim koristeći Psiphon za Windows u VPN načinu rada, ne učitavaju mi se web stranice. Dobijem poruke koje kažu da traženje domene nije uspjelo.

faq-vpn-dns-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon ograničava DNS promet na odobrene, provjerene DNS poslužitelje. Psiphon klijent automatski konfigurira postavke Vašeg VPN DNS poslužitelja. Ako Vam se javljaju greške vezane za DNS provjerite da niste zaraženi "DNS changer" zlonamjernim software-om, koji pokušava promjeniti postavke Vašeg DNS poslužitelja. Više informacija možete naći ovdje.

faq-configure-applications-question.message: Kako konfigurirati aplikacije da koriste Psiphon tunel?

faq-configure-applications-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon će automatski postaviti Vaš sustav da koristi lokalni HTTP/HTTPS proxy i lokalni SOCKS proxy. Brojevi porta za ove proxy-e su izabrani nasumično, osim ako drugačije nije određeno u postavkama Psiphon-a. Windows aplikacije koje koriste postavke proxy-a sustava će biti automatski proxy-ane. Možete ručno postaviti ostale aplikacije da koriste lokalne proxy-e. Psiphon za Windows i Psiphon za Android pokreću ove lokalne proxy-e.

faq-ssh-plus-question.message: Koji protokol Psiphon tunel koristi pod zadano?

faq-ssh-plus-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon koristi SSH uz dodatak skrivajućeg sloja na SSH rukovanje kako bi Vas zaštitio od uzimanja otiska prstiju protokola. Opis protokola može bit pronađen ovdje.

faq-autoproxy-question.message: Koristim AutoProxy. Kako mogu reći Psiphon-u za Windows da ne konfigurira postavke mog proxy-a sustava?

faq-autoproxy-question-toc.message: Koristim AutoProxy. Kako da kažem Psiphon-u za Windows da ne konfigurira postavke proxy-a mog sustava?

faq-autoproxy-answer-para-1.message: Kliknite Pokreni i upišite regedit da bi otvorili Registry Editor. Pronađite i otvorite HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Psiphon3, na desnoj strani će te vidjeti SkipProxySettings. Postavite vrijednost tog ključa na 1 i Psiphon neće automatski konfigurirati postavke proxy-a sustava.

faq-screen-filter-question.message: Zašto ne mogu odabrati "Vjerujem ovoj aplikaciji" kad se Psiphon za Android spoji prvi put?

faq-screen-filter-answer-para-1.message: Provjerite imate li pokrenutu aplikaciju koja radi kao filter zaslona ili upravlja svjetlinom Vašeg zaslona. Ako imate, probajte ju onemogućiti. Mnoge takve aplikacije (npr. Lux Auto Brightness, Twilight, Night Mode) ometaju korisničku interakciju s ovim upitom.
faq-screen-filter-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to 'What protocol does the default Psiphon tunnel use?'.

faq-isp-traffic-question-toc.message: Može li moj davatelj Internet usluge vidjeti što radim na Internetu dok koristim Psiphon?

faq-isp-traffic-question.message: Može li moj davatelj Internet usluge vidjeti što radim na Internetu dok koristim Psiphon?

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-1.message: All data that goes through Psiphon is encrypted. This means that your ISP cannot see the content of your Internet traffic: web pages you browse, your chat messages, your uploads, etc.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-2.message: Kako bilo, imajte na umu da je Psiphon dizajniran da bude alat za obilaženje cenzure te nije specifično dizajniran za protunadzorne svrhe. Psiphon ne spriječava pohranu povijesti pregledavanja web stranica i kolačića na Vaše računalo, a u nekim načinima rada, sav Vaš promet možda neće biti tuneliran kroz Psiphon -- primjerice ako su proxy postavke Vašeg preglednika krivo konfigurirane, ili ako ostavite preglednik otvoren nakon izlaska iz Psiphon-a.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-3.message: Također, postoje napredne tehnike koje mogu gledati mrežni promet i odrediti određene stvari o njemu, primjerice koja stranica se gleda. Primarni primjer ovoga je "uzimanje otiska prstiju prometa".

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-4.message: Ako trebate anonimnost preko Interneta onda bi trebali koristiti Tor umjesto Psiphon-a.

faq-root-wdm-question.message: Što se dogodilo načinu rada Cijeli uređaj za root-ane Andorid uređaje?
faq-root-wdm-question.description: This is a FAQ question. Previously, users with old Android devices could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-root-wdm-question-toc.message: Što se dogodilo načinu rada Cijeli uređaj za root-ane Andorid uređaje?
faq-root-wdm-question-toc.description: This is a FAQ question. Previously, users with old Android devices could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-root-wdm-answer-para-1.message: Prije Prosinca 2015. Psiphon za Android je imao značajku koja je dopuštala korisnicima starijih Android uređaja (prije-4.0/ICS) da tuneliraju cijeli uređaj ako je root-an. Veliko ažuriranje Psiphon-a u to doba je zahtjevalo uklanjanje te značajke.
faq-root-wdm-answer-para-1.description: This is the first paragraph of a FAQ answer. Previously, users with old Android devices (before Android version 4.0, also known as Ice Cream Sandwich) could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-refund-question.message: How do I get a refund for a subscription, purchase of PsiCash, or other purchase?
faq-refund-question.description: This is an FAQ question. This is for refunds made with money to purchase subscriptions, PsiCash, etc. 'Puchase of PsiCash' means buying PsiCash credit with real money.

faq-refund-answer-para-1.message: Android: If it has been less than 48 hours since you made the purchase, you can get a refund through the Play Store. After 48 hours, email us at refund+android@psiphon.ca. Please include your name, the email address of your Play Store account, the date of the purchase, what was purchased, the amount of the purchase, and the reason you are requesting the refund.
faq-refund-answer-para-1.description: This is the first paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-2.message: iOS: Please request the refund through the App Store.
faq-refund-answer-para-2.description: This is the second paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-3.message: Windows: Email us at refund+windows@psiphon.ca. Please include your name, the email address or phone number used at the time of purchase, the date of the purchase, what was purchased, the amount of the purchase, and the reason you are requesting the refund.
faq-refund-answer-para-3.description: This is the third paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-4.message: Note that refunds may take up to a week to process.
faq-refund-answer-para-4.description: This is the fourth paragraph of an FAQ answer.

alert-heading.description: Heading of the alert that shows on the main page when there's a security or other concern that needs to be brought to the attention of users

alert-body.message: Psiphon tim je otkrio specifičnu instancu malware-a maskiranu kao Psiphon za Windows izvršna datoteka. Malware se distribuira kao zip datoteka naziva "psiphone3.zip" sa www.copy.com i može biti dostupan sa drugih izvora. Zip datoteka sadrži malicioznu izvršnu datotekunaziva "psiphone3.exe" sa svojstvima opisanim na Virus Total. Obratite pozornost na pogrešno napisan naziv. Ova Windows izvršna datoteka nije digitalno potpisana od strane Psiphon Inc. Nikad ne pokrećite nova preuzimanja Psiphon-a bez provjere digitalnog potpisa, opisane ovdje.

what-is-psiphon-body-para-1.message: Psiphon je alat za obilaženje razvijen od strane Psiphon Inc. koji koristi VPN, SSH i HTTP Proxy tehnologije da bi Vam pružio necenzuriran pristup Internet sadržaju. Vaš Psiphon klijent će automatski naučiti nova pristupna mjesta da bi maksimizirao Vaše šanse za obilaženje cenzure.

what-is-psiphon-body-para-2.message: Psiphon je dizajniran da Vam pruži otvoreni pristup mrežnom sadržaju. Psiphon ne povećava Vašu online privatnost i ne bi ga se trebalo smatrati, ili koristiti kao online sigurnosni alat.

main-gets-you-where-you-want-head-2.message: Cenzorira Vas Vaša država, korporacija ili kampus?

main-gets-you-where-you-want-para-1.message: Nakon nošenja sa represivnim režimima diljem svijeta, unikatno smo sposobni pomoći Vam da dobijete sadržaj koji hoćete, kad hoćete i gdje hoćete.

main-gets-you-there-safely-head-2.message: Želite surfati sigurno koristeći javni WiFi?

main-gets-you-there-safely-para-1.message: Besplatan internet je super, ali ukradeni kolačići i računi nisu. Psiphon Vam daje siguran put do Interneta, bez obzira koju mrežu koristite da bi se spojili.

main-pick-three-para-1.message: Od 2008. Psiphon je pomogao milijunima ljudi diljem svijeta u zemljama s ograničenom slobodom da bi sigurno pristupili cenzuriranim idejama i znanju. Sad Psiphon može učiniti isto za Vas.

user-guide-windows-head.description: heading for the Android section of the User Guide

user-guide-windows-para-verify-authentic.message: Prvo bi trebali provjeriti da je Vaša kopija Psiphon-a za Windows autentična.

user-guide-windows-para-1.message: Preuzmite klijentski program i pokrenite ga. Kad ga pokrenete, trebali bi vidjeti sigurnosno upozorenje koje pokazuje da je ovaj program legitiman proizvod Psiphon Inc.

user-guide-windows-para-2.message: Psipon automatski počinje spajanje kad ga pokrenete. Dok se spaja, pojavit će se rotirajuća ikona. Možete odabrati jedan od sljedećih načina tuneliranja: VPN (L2TP/IPsec), SSH ili SSH+ (SSH plus maskiranje, nasumični sloj dodan na SSH koji izbjegava uzimanje otiska protokola).

user-guide-windows-para-3.message: Veza sa Psiphon poslužiteljem je uspostavljena kad se prikaže zelena ikona. U VPN načinu rada, sav Vaš promet je automatski tuneliran kroz Psiphon.

user-guide-windows-para-4.message: U SSH i SSH+ načinima rada PSiphon automatski postavlja proxy postavke Windows sustava, tako da će mrežni promet aplikacija koje poštuju ove postavke biti tuneliran kroz Psiphon. Ove postavke poštuju svi veći web preglednici.

user-guide-windows-para-5.message: Nadalje, u SSH i SSH+ načinima rada, Psiphon nudi opciju podijeljenog tunela gdje se internacionalni promet tunelira kroz proxy, a domaći promet ne. Označite "Ne proxy-aj domaće web stranice" opciju da bi omogućili podijeljeno tuneliranje. Kad je ova opcija uključena, ne-proxy-ane domene su prijavljenje u dijelu s porukama.

user-guide-windows-para-6.message: Kad zatvorite program Psiphon automatski prekida vezu. Također možete kliknuti na ikonu kako bi promjenili stanje veze.

about-who-we-are-para-1.message: Psiphon Inc. je tvrtka zasnovana u Torontu, koja proizvodi otvoreni multiplatformski software koji pomaže više od 3 milijuna ljudi svaki tjedan da se spoje sa sadržajem na Internetu. Mi smo tim fokusiran na dostavljanje najboljeg software-a koji možemo, redovito predstavljanje novih proizvoda i osiguranje našeg razvoja prema potrebama naše stalno rastuće globalne publike.

about-who-we-are-exec-team-para-1.message: Michael Hull je predsjednik Psiphon Inc. i sa Psiphonom je od samih početaka, kad je počeo kao projekt Citizen Laba, Sveučilišta u Torontu. Otad je vodio razvoj softwarea i pomaže u pokretanju inovacije koja održava Psiphon na samom vrhu.

about-who-we-are-software-development-pa.message: U Psiphon-u, želimo da naši korisnici dožive dobro iskustvo. To znači da naš software mora biti jednostavan za upotrebu, naša mreža mora biti brza, te oboje moraju biti čvrsti i stabilni. To je teško za bilo koga tko razvija software, no posebice kad taj software mora funkcionirati u neprijateljskom okruženju koje se stalno mijenja, te na mnogo jezika i platformi.

Također znamo da je podjednako važno naporno raditi za naše korisnike iza kulisa. Štitimo naše korisnike i njihove podatke do kraja. Korisnici možda nikad neće primjetiti mjere postavljene za osiguranje njihove privatnosti i sigurnosti, no mi znamo da ih cijene.

Psiphon-ov razvojni tim ulaže sve napore da dostave najbolja, najbrža, najlakša i najotvorenija riješenja za obilaženje. Također istražujemo nova područja gdje naša ekspertiza može zaštititi, ojačati i osloboditi umove korisnika diljem svijeta.

about-who-we-are-ops-para-1.message: Imamo ugovore s raznim tvrtkama, od velikih internacionalnih emitera do malih organizacija boraca za ljudska prava koji rade u pojedinačnim državama. Naš tim Operacija i dosezanja korisnika sastavlja izvješća koja prikazuju koliko ljudi pristupa Psiphon-u kroz njihove distribucijske metode. Također proučavaju i traže nadolazeće događaje koji bi mogli imati utjecaj na slobodni tok informacija na Internetu.

about-who-we-are-partners-para-1.message: Psiphon works closely with various groups to provide support and advice to people using Psiphon wherever they are. We have translations for our software in dozens of languages, and are adding more to our products through Transifex, with the help of the Localization Lab.
about-who-we-are-partners-para-1.description: There are more than 20 languages currently supported, so if your language has a better fit than 'dozens', please use it. You can also just use something more generic, like 'many'.

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-what-doing.message: Omogućujemo zapisivanje pristupa za jednu stranicu Amazon S3 "kanta" (tj. kontejner za pohranu). (Zbog tehničkih razloga, imamo desetke kopija stranice na različitim S3 kantama.)

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-why-doing.message: Radimo to tako da odredimo koliko ima pristupa "popisu udaljenih poslužitelja" pohranjenom u kanti. To će nam pomoći da vidimo koliok korisnika se ne uspijeva spojiti.

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-when-doing.message: Zapisivanje će biti omogućeno od 2014-04-17T15:00Z do 2014-04-18T15:00Z.

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-what-data.message: Zapisivanjem će se prikupljati IP adrese, korisnički agenti i vremenski žigovi pristupa stranici. Nakon što podatci budu obrađeni, imati ćemo broj korisnika, podijeljenih po zemljopisnim regijama, koji su pristupili predmetnoj datoteci.

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-how-long-retain.message: Podatci će biti zadržani najdulje tjedan dana. Broj korisnika ćemo zadržati dulje - možda beskonačno.

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-how-many-users.message: Ne znamo sa sigurnošću koliko će korisnika biti pogođeno (zato to i radimo), ali mislimo da će to biti manje od 10,000.

privacy-bulletin-entry-1-who-will-see.message: Zapisi o pristupu su također pohranjeni na Amazon S3 kanti, tako da će Amazon imati pristup zapisima. (kako bilo, Amazon poslužuje datoteke, tako da već mogu pristupiti ovim informacijama.)

privacy-bulletin-entry-2-what-doing.message: Ažuriramo svoju Izjavu o privatnosti. Ovo uključuje spajanje odgovora na često postavjeno pitanje "Koje informacije Psihpon prikuplja?" u nju.
privacy-bulletin-entry-2-what-doing.description: A section of a privacy bulletin, indicating what is occurring that necessitates the bulletin

privacy-bulletin-entry-2-why-doing.message: Stranica Izjave o privatnosti je sad jedino mjesto koje korisnici moraju posjetiti kako bi bili upoznati sa Psiphon-ovim izjavama o privatnosti i prikupljanju podataka. Ažurirana je tako da reflektira korištenje oglasa, analize i zapisivanja za neke od naših stranica.

privacy-bulletin-entry-5-title.message: 2020-06-19: Privacy exception: Accidental user IP retention

privacy-bulletin-entry-5-what-happened.message: We use AWS S3 to host websites, client applications, and remote server lists. We discovered that logging had been enabled for many of our S3 resources since June 2015. These logs include IP addresses of users who accessed those resources.
privacy-bulletin-entry-5-what-happened.description: A section of a privacy bulletin, describing what happened to necessitate the bulletin

privacy-bulletin-entry-5-impact.message: We have no indication that any logs were obtained by any external party, so this is not a user data breach. However, it is a violation of our Privacy Policy.
privacy-bulletin-entry-5-impact.description: A section of a privacy bulletin, describing the impact of a privacy event

privacy-bulletin-entry-5-resolution.message: Logging has been disabled for user-accessible S3 buckets and all logs have been deleted. We are working on a system to keep track of privacy exceptions and issues, and investigating AWS resource auditing.
privacy-bulletin-entry-5-resolution.description: A section of a privacy bulletin, describing the resolution of a privacy event

privacy-para-1.message: Psiphon je posvećen zaštiti privatnosti svojih mušterija, krajnjih korisnika, distributora i dobavljača. Ovakva politika privatnosti ima za svrhu pružanje općih informacija kako Vaše osobne informacije mogu biti korištene. Psiphon je kanadska korporacija sa sjedištem u Ontariju, te je naša izjava o privatnosti razvijana u skladu s kanadskim i ontarijskim zakonima i statutima o privatnosti.

privacy-para-2.message: Za daljnje informacije vezane uz kanadske i ontarijske zakone o privatnosti, molimo posjetite:

privacy-ontario-privacy-commissioner-lin.message: Ured Povjerenika za Informacije i Privatnost Ontaria

privacy-updates-head.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy. The section description how we handle updates to the policy.

privacy-bulletin-info-para-1.message: From time to time, Psiphon will add entries to our Privacy Bulletin. This will happen for two reasons:

privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-1.message: We modify the Privacy Policy. This can happen when new laws add different requirements, or if we start or stop using a third-party service. We will detail the changes made to the policy.
privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-1.description: A bullet list item following from 'This will happen for two reasons:'

privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-2.message: We temporarily deviate from our Privacy Policy by changing our information collection behaviour. This is typically done to resolve a problem with our service, or to give us more time to analyze our data relating to an interesting censorship event. We will describe the change, for example what was recorded, how long it was kept, and why.
privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-2.description: A bullet list item following from 'This will happen for two reasons:'

privacy-information-collected-client-ads.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page above the info about what user information is collected by the ads shown in the Psiphon client software

privacy-information-collected-client-adv.message: Nekad koristimo oglašavanje kako bi podržali naše usluge, što može koristiti tehnologiju kao što su kolačići i web beacon-i. Upotreba kolačića naših partnera oglašivača omogućuje njima i njihovim partnerima da poslužuju reklame temeljene na podatcima o Vašem korištenju. Svim informacijama skupljenim kroz ovaj proces se upravlja pod pravilima privatnosti naših partnera:
Možete se isključiti iz korištenja kolačića za internet oglase posjećivanjem:

privacy-information-collected-websites-h.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page above the info about what user information is collected by the Psiphon websites

privacy-information-collected-websites-g.description: Sub-heading for section describing use of Google Analytics and what info they collect

privacy-information-collected-websites-g.message: Koristimo Google Analytics na nekim našim stranicama kako bi prikupili informacije o korištenju. Informacije koje skupi Google Analytics će biti korištene samo za statističku analizu vezanu uz Vaše ponašanje prilikom pregledavanja ove stranice. Informacije koje dobijemo od Google Analytics-a nisu osobno identificirajuće, niti su kombinirane s informacijama iz drugih izvora, a u svrhu stvaranja osobno identificirajućih informacija.

Google Analytics sets a permanent cookie in your web browser to identify you as a unique user the next time you visit the site, but this cookie cannot be used by anyone except Google, and the data collected cannot be altered or retrieved by services from other domains.

Google-ova mogućnost da koristi i dijeli informacije prikupljene od strane Google Analytics-a o Vašim posjetima ovoj stranici je ograničena Google Analytics uvjetima korištenja i Google-ovom izjavom o privatnosti. Možete odustati od ovoga gašenjem kolačića u postavkama svog web preglednika.

privacy-information-collected-s3-logging.description: Sub-heading for section describing use of logging access to data storage (aka S3 bucket logging). The way to read this is 'creation of logs for user accesses to data storage'. Psiphon 'stores' websites, downloads, and upgrades (the 'data') in Amazon S3 (the 'storage'). Users 'access' the data storage. And, somtimes, we 'log' those accesses. (For example, if we suspect attackers are accessing the storage, or if it seems the storage is blocked by a country.)

privacy-information-collected-s3-logging.message: Koristimo Amazon S3 da bi pohranili resurse kao što su datoteke web stranica i popisi za otkrivanje Psiphon poslužitelja. Ponekad omogućimo stvaranje zapisa o preuzimanju tih datoteka. Analiziranje tih zapisa nam pomaže odgovoriti na pitanja kao što su "koliko korisnika pokreću ali ne završavaju preuzimanje popisa za otkrivanje poslužitelja?", "kako su preuzeti podatci podijeljeni između resursa web stranica i otkrivanja poslužitelja?" i "pokušavaju li napadači odraditi napade uskraćivanja usluge na našim stranicama?"

Zapisi o pristupu S3 kanti sadržavaju IP adrese, korisničke agente i vremenske žigove. Ovi zapisi su pohranjeni na samom S3, tako da im Amazon može pristupiti. (Kako bilo, Amazon već poslužuje te datoteke, tako da već mogu pristupiti tim informacijama.) Psiphon programeri će preuzeti zapise, skupiti i analizirati podatke, te zatim obrisati zapise. Sirovi podatci će biti zadržani onoliko koliko je potrebno da ih se skupi i neće biti dijeljeni s trećim strankama.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon runs many servers for many reasons. On those servers we collect the following data to monitor the health of the Psiphon system. It helps us to learn things like how well Psiphon is working, what propagation strategies are effective, and how users are obtaining the Psiphon client.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-2-.message: Number of email requests to our automated responder
Koliko često je svaki protokol korišten i kodovi pogreške nakon svake greške
Koliko često su novi poslužitelji otkriveni
Amount of data transferred through the Psiphon system
Client platform (simplified operating system list; not a detailed browser user agent)

faq-information-collected-answer-para-3b.message: Psiphon poslužitelji ne prikupljaju korisničke IP adrese tokom normalnog rada. Psiphon ne zahtjeva korisničke račune, tako da, pod normalno, ne prikuplja email adrese, korisnička imena ili lozinke.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-4.message: Event logs include timestamps, region codes (country and city), and non-identifying attributes including sponsor ID (determined by which Psiphon client build is used), client version, and protocol type.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-5.message: Any statistics shared with third parties are aggregated by date, sponsor, and region, to a sufficient coarseness that they are non-identifying.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-he.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page for the section describing handling of user traffic data and activity statistics through the Psiphon VPN

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Zašto bi Vas bilo briga?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes why it's important for users to consider what a VPN does with their traffic data.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: When using a VPN or proxy you should be concerned about what the VPN provider can see in your data, collect from it, and do to it.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: When you use a VPN, all data to and from your device goes through it. If you visit a website that uses unencrypted HTTP, all of that site's data is visible to the VPN. If you visit a website that uses encrypted HTTPS, the site content is encrypted, but some information about the site might be visible to the VPN. Other apps and services on your device will also transfer data that is encrypted or unencrypted. (Note that this is distinct from the encryption that all VPNs provide. Here we're only concerned with data that is or is not encrypted inside the VPN tunnel.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page. '<em>' is an 'emphasis' (like italics) HTML tag, which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: For unencrypted services, it is possible for a VPN provider to see, collect, and modify (e.g., injecting ads into) the contents of your data. For encrypted data, it is still possible for a VPN to collect metadata about sites visited or actions taken. You should also be concerned with your VPN provider sharing your data with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes what undesirable things Psiphon DOES NOT do with user data. '<strong>' is an HTML tag that makes text bold, which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: We DO NOT collect or store any VPN data that is not mentioned here.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: We DO NOT modify the contents of your VPN data.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: We DO NOT share any sensitive or user-specific data with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.message: What kinds of user data does Psiphon collect?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.message: We will define some categories of data to help us talk about them in the context of Psiphon.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.description: Paragraph text in the 'What kinds of user data does Psiphon collect?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'User Activity Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: While a user's device is tunneled through Psiphon, we collect some information about how they're using it. We record what protocol Psiphon used to connect, how long the device was connected, how many bytes were transferred during the session, and what city, country, and ISP the connection came from. For some domains (but very few, and only popular ones) or server IP addresses (e.g., known malware servers) that are visited, we also record how many bytes were transferred to it. (But never full URLs or anything more sensitive. And only domains of general interest, not all domains.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: Geographical location and ISP info are derived from user IP addresses, which are then immediately discarded.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: An example of user activity data might be: At a certain time a user connected from New York City, using Comcast, and transferred 100MB from youtube.com and 300MB in total.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: We consider user activity data the most sensitive category of data. We never, ever share this data with third parties. We keep user activity data for at most 90 days, and then we aggregate it and delete it. Backups of that data are kept for a reasonable amount of time.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'Aggregated Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Data is “aggregated” by taking a lot of sensitive user activity data and combining it together to form coarse statistical data that is no longer specific to a user. After aggregation, the user activity data is deleted.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: An example of aggregated data might be: On a particular day, 250 people connected from New York City using Comcast, and transferred 200GB from youtube.com and 500GB in total.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Aggregated data is much less sensitive than activity data, but we still treat it as potentially sensitive and do not share it in this form.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'Shareable Aggregated Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: When sharing aggregated data with third parties, we make sure that the data could not be combined with other sources to reveal user identities. For example, we do not share data for countries that only have a few Psiphon users in a day. We make sure that the data is anonymized.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: We also never share domain-related information with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: An example of shareable aggregated data might be: On a particular day, 500 people connected from New York City and transferred 800GB in total.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: An example of data that is not shareable: On a particular day, 2 people connected from Los Angeles. Those people will be included in the stats for the entire US, but that is too few people to anonymously share city data for.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page. '<em>' is an HTML tag that adds emphasis (like italics), which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes what Psiphon does with the little bit of VPN data that it collects stats from.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Activity and aggregated statistical data are vital for us to make Psiphon work best. It allows us to do things like:
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Monitor the health and success of the Psiphon network: We need to know how many people are connecting, from where, how much data they're transferring, and if they're having any problems.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Monitor threats to our users' devices: We watch for malware infections that attempt to contact command-and-control servers.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Ensure users stay connected while foiling censors: We try to detect that a user is behaving like a real person and then reveal new Psiphon servers to them. (This is our obfuscated server list technology.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Procjena budućih troškova: Ogromna količina korisničkih podataka koje prenesemo svaki mjesec je velik faktor u našim troškovima. Od vitalne je važnosti da vidimo i razumijemo korisničke oscilacije.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kako bi odredili narav svih velikih cenzorskih događaja: Stranice i usluge su često i iznenada blokirane bez upozorenja, što može dovesti do velikih varijacija u regionalnom korištenju Psiphona. Npr. imali smo 20 puta veću uporabu po danu kad je Brazil blokirao WhatsApp ili kad je Turska blokirala društvene medije.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Kako bi razumjeli kome trebamo pomoći: neke stranice i usluge nikad neće biti blokirane nigdje, neke će uvijek biti blokirane u određenim zemljama, i neke će biti povremeno blokirane u nekim zemljama. Kako bi osigurali da naši korisnici mogu slobodno komunicirati i učiti, moramo razumjeti ove uzorke, vidjeti tko je sve zahvaćen i raditi s našim partnerima kako bi osigurali da njihove usluge rade sa Psiphonom.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes who Psiphon shares VPN data stats. The answer will be organizations and not specific people, in case that makes a difference in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Shareable aggregated data is shared with sponsors, organizations we collaborate with, and civil society researchers. The data can be used to show such things as:
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Who does Psiphon share these statistics with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: How well Psiphon is working in a particular region.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: The blocking patterns in a given country, for example during political events.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: That the populace of a country is determined to access the open internet.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Again, only anonymized shareable aggregated data is ever shared with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Who does Psiphon share these statistics with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: The PsiCash system only collects information necessary for the functioning of the system, monitoring the health of the system, and ensuring the security of the system.
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Paragraph text in the 'PsiCash' section of the Privacy page. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: The PsiCash server stores per-user information to allow for operation of the system, including:
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Paragraph text in the 'PsiCash' section of the Privacy page. This is preamble to a detailed bullet list. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.
Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to randomly generated values that allow a user to access and utilize the system.
Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to the user PsiCash balance -- i.e., how much they have available to spend.
Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to the date and time that the user last earned or spent PsiCash.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: PsiCash earning history, including what actions the rewards were granted for
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to transaction history of the user earning PsiCash. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: PsiCash spending history, including what purchases were made
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to transaction history of the user spending PsiCash, such as by buying Speed Boost. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: In the user's web browser, some data is stored to allow for earning rewards and making purchases. This data includes:
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Paragraph text in the 'PsiCash' section of the Privacy page. This is preamble to a detailed bullet list. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.
Bullet list item in the 'data stored in web browser' list. This item refers to randomly generated values that allow a user to access and utilize the system.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: when a PsiCash reward is allowed to be claimed again
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Bullet list item in the 'data stored in web browser' list. PsiCash earning rewards can only be claimed every so often in the web browser, so this refers to the date-time when the user is next allowed to claim a reward. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: For monitoring system health and security, system activity data is collected and aggregated. This data includes:
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Paragraph text in the 'PsiCash' section of the Privacy page. This is preamble to a detailed bullet list. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.
Bullet list item in the 'system health and security' list. This item refers to the country from which a user was connecting when he/she performed an action.
Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to the user PsiCash balance -- i.e., how much they have available to spend.

Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to 'user agent string' of the client software used to perform an action. This can be either a web browser or the Psiphon client itself.
Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to the version of the Psiphon app.
Bullet list item in the 'operation of the system' list. This item refers to transaction history of the user earning and spending PsiCash. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.

privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.message: Individual user data is never shared with third parties. Coarse aggregate statistics may be shared, but never in a form that can possibly identify users.
privacy-information-collected-psicash-pa.description: Paragraph text in the 'PsiCash' section of the Privacy page. 'PsiCash' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-6.message: Kad odlučite podnijeti povratne informacije kroz Psiphon, imati ćete opciju uključivanja dijagnostičkih podataka. Koristimo ove podatke kako bi nam pomogli u rješavanju problema koje možda imate, te ih koristimo da nam pomognu u održavanju glatkog rada Psiphon-a. Slanje ovih podataka je u potpunosti opcionalno. Podatci su enkriptirani prije nego ih pošaljete, te ih jedino mi možemo dekriptirati. Informacije uključene variraju od platforme do platforme ali mogu uključivati:

faq-information-collected-answer-para-7-.message: Kako ste spojeni na internet (primjerice, koristite li dial-up ili ste spojeni preko proxy-a)
Koliko slobodne memorije Vaše računalo ima

faq-information-collected-answer-para-8-.message: Da li je Vaš uređaj root-an

faq-information-collected-answer-para-11.message: Kad pošaljete email zahtjev našem poslužitelju email auto-odgovaratelja, možemo vidjeti Vašu email adresu. Dok se Vaš email obrađuje pohranjuje se na disk email poslužitelja, te je obrisan čim se obradi (uobičajeno unutar par sekundi). Ne dopuštamo Vašem email-u da bude zapisan u datoteke zapisa o događajima sustava.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-12.message: Naš poslužitelj email auto-odgovaratelja se nalazi na Amazon EC2 oblaku. Pošaljemo dva email odgovora na svaki zahtjev, te za jedan od tih odgovora koristimo Amazon SES. To znači da Amazon može vidjeti email koji ste poslali i naš odgovor Vama.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-13.message: Za svaki email koji primimo, pohranjujemo sljedeće informacije:
Datum i vrijeme zaprimanja email zahtjeva.
Datum i vrijeme odgovora na email zahtjev.
Mail poslužitelj s kojeg je došao zahtjev. (Tri najmanje specifična dijela domenskog imena. Na primjer, ne1.example.com, ali ne web120113.mail.ne1.example.com.)

faq-information-collected-answer-para-14.message: Ako trbao dijagnosticirati problem, možemo omogućiti potpuno stvaranje zapisa na kratko vrijeme. Ako pošaljete email u tom periodu, Vaša email adresa će biti zapisana u zapise o događajima. Ti zapisi se brišu nakon tjedan dana.
